overview: Gavyn Davies is a Founding Partner of Anthos, a founder of Prisma Capital Partners, a $4 billion fund of hedge funds, Chairman of Fulcrum Asset Management, a $1.5 billion macro hedge fund, and a founder of Active Private Equity in the UK. Previously, Gavyn was Chairman of the British Broadcasting Corporation (BBC) in the UK. Prior to that, he was a Partner and Managing Director of Goldman, Sachs & Co. where he was the firmâ€™s Chief Economist and Chairman of the Global Investment Research Department. Before joining Goldman Sachs, he was an economic advisor to the British Government.
